relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Foundation DNS
relatedBlades.subtitle: The most reliable and best performing DNS on the market. Easy to use, simple pricing, with advanced features.
relatedBlades.copy: Trust your DNS to Cloudflare's global Anycast network that spans %{DataCenterCount} data centers and %{CountryCount} countries, reaching about 95% of the world's population within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds}ms â€” providing inherent DDoS protection, reducing latency, and improving uptime.
iconCopyList: The Anycast difference. DNS queries will be resolved from any data center in our global network, just milliseconds away from your users.

Our highly secure cloud infrastructure at the edge protects your domains  from infrastructure-level and volumetric DDoS attacks from the Internet. Enable DNSSEC with one click to sign and validate DNS queries in order to prevent domain hijacking.
Simplified pricing for Foundation DNS - only get charged based on the number of DNS queries per month

relatedBlades.title: Key Features
keyFeature: DNS resolution at the edge using global Anycast network
DNSSEC support for primary and secondary DNS
Secondary DNS for incoming and outgoing zone transfers
Support for CNAME records at the apex level
Fully redundant architecture designed for 100% uptime

features.title: Optimal Redundancy
features.description: Our global Anycast network allows DNS resolution at the network edge in each of our data centers across %{DataCenterCount}+ cities.

features.title: Safeguard from DNS attacks
features.description: Cloudflare offers built-in DDoS protection and one-click DNSSEC to ensure your applications are always safeguarded from DNS attacks.

features.title: Performance you can trust
features.description: Our authoritative DNS is the fastest in the world, offering DNS lookup speed of 11ms on average and worldwide DNS propagation in less than five seconds.

features.title: We make DNS easy
features.description: All your domains can be managed through our user-friendly interface or via an API, regardless of where your Internet properties are hosted.

relatedBlades.title: The Cloudflare global network
relatedBlades.copy:
Our vast global network, which is one of the fastest on the planet, is trusted by millions of web properties. 

With direct connections to nearly every service provider and cloud provider, the Cloudflare network can reach 95% of the world's population within 50 ms.

statsFeatures.title: %{DataCenterCount}

statsFeatures.title: %{NetworkInterconnects}
statsFeatures.description: networks directly connect to Cloudflare, including every major ISP, cloud provider, and enterprise

statsFeatures.title: ~50 ms
statsFeatures.description: from about %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the world's Internet-connected population

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare's amazingly intelligent DDoS protection is what originally drew us in, but using Cloudflare DNS for our biggest zone was by far the easiest decision. We had run into zone size limitations with other providers, but not with Cloudflare DNS."
